directions: In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, ginger, salt, pepper, basil, mustard and lemon juice until smooth. Place the steaks on a broiling pan, and pour 1/4 of the mixture over each one. Massage into the meat.
Broil the steaks for 5 minutes, then turn over and cook to your desired degree of doneness.
ingredients: 4 (8 ounce) beef sirloin steaks, at least 3/4 inch thick
title: Ginger Steak
